description: Add a small animated Build Loop visualization to the home page that reinforces the site’s narrative: ship, note, repeat. The component should animate once when it scrolls into view.

userStories.title: Build Loop Section
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want a clear build-loop visualization so that the iterative nature of the blog is obvious
acceptanceCriteria: A new Build Loop section appears between the hero and the build notes cards
It lists: Code → Commit → Test → Write note → Ship
Animation plays once when the section scrolls into view
Verify in browser using agent-browser skill

userStories.title: Mobile Behavior
userStories.description: As a mobile visitor, I want the build loop to remain legible so that it’s usable on small screens
acceptanceCriteria: Steps stack cleanly on mobile with comfortable spacing
Animation timing remains subtle and not jarring on mobile
Verify in browser using agent-browser skill
